title: OCD XVI registration closed... we are full!

posts.content: She'll be a welcome edition to their S'mores club.

Claushema wrote:She'll be a welcome edition to their S'mores club.


excellent,I had to ask my daughter what S'mores is, you learn something new every day

Claushema wrote:She'll be a welcome edition to their S'mores club.


Hannah's really looking forward to it. But then, who isn't?
Robin wants to know where are Milly and Erin?

Sorry, Erin can't come this year as she can't get the time off school. She always used to just phone in sick when she was in primary school, but she's moved up to the Grammar school now and doesn't want to push it.

Gutted, but there's nothing we can do. I don't really want to do it without her.
That's really sad news. We'll raise a toasted marshmellow in her honor. I would not want to come without Robin either.

1. Buzz (Buzz & Maz & kids) - 1954 11 window kombi
2. OP (Neale + 1 maybe) - 1955 11 window kombi
3. Claushema (Dan & Robin) - 1967 S042
4. GreenBeetleDave (Dave & Jean) - 1963 11 window microbus/camper
5. Dc67 Greg & Steph 67 double cab
6. Bren ( Bren & Sandra ) 1966 11 Window kombi
7.Geocamper1(Aeron) 1965 11 window microbus/Camper
8. Bunda & family (Lauren, Hannah and Viola) 1966 Arcomobil
9. Si & Andi - 1961 11 window kombi (devon)
10. Andrew & Michelle - 1967 11 Window Kombi (Devon)
11. Dolly23 - Grant and Sue - 1960 DC towing a 62 Eriba Faun
12 frankiedemus (Frank,Yen & Sammy)- 1966 11window kombi (SO42)
13 Brian and Caroline 67 Devon or maybe Sundial
Was getting worried there Brian. Looking forward to catching up.
Can't make it this year Dan , just moved house it needs loads of work, also may sell jack , will miss you at the cider farm ,bob n julie
That's not what I wanted to hear. I understand but still. Good luck with everything.

robert.copley1 wrote:Can't make it this year Dan , just moved house it needs loads of work, also may sell jack , will miss you at the cider farm ,bob n julie


Don't you dare sell Jack - camp in the house and service the bus! Sorry you won't be at OCD - we''ll miss both of you
Getting closer! Going test camping this weekend to make sure our bus and gear are both in order. Anybody else on the list?
I think I need too, but not for me as I have two birthdays to organise at both ends of the spectrum a 90 year old and a 21 year old, hope all goes well.
Everything is good to go. Just hope it's going to be warmer than it was last nite. Hailstorm in April?
